## EditorProvider() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Hydrates the required contexts

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function EditorProvider({ createStoreEnhancer, omitDragDropContext, children }: {
    omitDragDropContext?: boolean;
    createStoreEnhancer?: StoreEnhancerFactory;
    children: React.ReactNode;
}): JSX.Element;
```
